Just finished my last exam for the year. Fourth year is done and it feels good.
@katiealicemc I literally have a suitcase full of books under my desk because they won't fit anywhere else in my flat T_T
@scoutriver yeah, NZ desperately needs more local treatment options :/ (preaching to the choir I'm sure!)
@scoutriver yeah I should clarify that I'm from Palmy/"the regions" so I speak from experience unfortunately!
@scoutriver you're right in that at least there's Auckland and Wgtn (C)REDS but still plenty of ppl in the regions falling through the gaps
@scoutriver yeah but CREDS won't take you if you're medically unstable & no beds in Wgtn hospitals dedicated for ED patients unfortunately
@scoutriver even in North Is you're not much better off w/ no dedicated ED beds in hospitals other than starship (to my knowledge).
This shouldn't be a radical concept
We want a world where people of all genders are safe and have the opportunity to achieve their goals
We don't want a matriarchy. We want a world free of sexual and domestic violence, a world where girls the world over all go to school.
Not sure how seriously the govt takes women's rights if the PM won't even admit to knowing what feminism is - https://t.co/Ma8jA2EBBw
2016 has fully rekt my 'don't talk too much about politics on public social media' policy
